page.title: 03BROCKLESBY PARK SCHOOL
page.content: The school is comprised of two teachers,myself(head) and Mrs. Wall who is responsible for the infants. At present we have 39 children on roll many of whom come from the village of Limber. Children from outlying homes are trasnsported to school by coach each day. The school day begins at 0845 and ends at 1500 with an hour for lunch. With so few children on roll there is a great danger that the school may one day be forced to close. Closure nearly took place in 1982 when the number of children fell to 27. Had it not been for the influence of the Earl of Yarborough the school would have had to close. Chidren bring a packed lunch to school each day as there are now no catering facilities. Mrs.Wall is intending to purchase the school house this year.
